name: 2020.01/ProjetoVII/Ensō
description:
A downloadable game for Windows

“Today is victory over yourself of yesterday; 
tomorrow is your victory over lesser men.”
― Miyamoto Musashi, The Book of Five Rings

After the fall of the Yamamoto school in the city of Isagawa, Hiroyuki Ishigame is tasked with eliminating Naosuke Wachi, the greatest pupil of the old martial arts master Gensuke. This task will make Ishigame take a new direction in his life: the Path of the Five Rings.

Ensō is a top-down 2D Action game focused on fighting between samurai in Japan's Edo Period, with an attack and defense system based on timing and parries.
